title: Discussion-Based Mathematical Language MOOC Design: Customized Course for Intermediate Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of mathematical concepts and intermediate (L2) language proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning for mid-level professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mathematical problem-solving process in L2 language with over 80% accuracy
Learners can reconstruct their mathematical thinking process more than three times based on peer feedback in discussion forums
Learners can achieve over 90% of weekly learning goals using self-directed learning strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
